post.title: Code test
post.excerpt: I am trying to update my ‘state’ array and insert items of type String into it with ‘setState’ but it doesn’t works.I know it’s not work with push().I also tried to update my ‘state’ array with the spread operator but it also doesn’t work.Here my code: useEffect(() => { document.querySelector(«body»).classList.add(«line-numbers»); Prism.highlightAll(); }, []);
post.content:
I am trying to update my ‘state’ array and insert items of type String into it with ‘setState’ but it doesn’t works.
I know it’s not work with push().
I also tried to update my ‘state’ array with the spread operator but it also doesn’t work.
Here my code:


    useEffect(() => {
        document.querySelector("body").classList.add("line-numbers");
        Prism.highlightAll();
    }, []);
